markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Whirlwind Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1197) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193); expert proficiency in your staff

**Requirements**
You are wielding your staff, which must have the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190) trait.

</column>

---

You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as you remain in this stance.
name: Whirlwind Stance
prerequisite: Staff Acrobat Dedication; expert proficiency in your staff
prerequisite_markdown: [Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193); expert proficiency in your staff
requirement: You are wielding your staff, which must have the  parry  trait.
